1.0.0.en: Ohm on Wifi driver - Temeprature control with resistance

1.1.0.en: Add support for using custom table 99 for default temperature to resistance mapping.

1.1.1.en: FIX: Swedish translations bug in settings .json

1.2.0.en: ADD: Axios intercepts for http error handling.

1.3.0.en: Replaced Axios http-client with http.min for optimized memory performance.

1.3.2.en: FIX: Connectivity issues may cause app to crash. Check uptime from device.

1.3.3.en: API Verify received json for proper attributes

1.3.5.en: Capabilities updates for upcoming HP23 12.2.0 firmware changes

1.3.6.en: Handle errors when device becomes unavailable.

1.3.9.en: Add error handling for oncaught promises.
